properties.name: conductor.default-event-queue.type
properties.description: The default event queue type to listen on for the WAIT task.

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.sqs.authorized-accounts
properties.description: The AWS account Ids authorized to send messages to the queues

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.sqs.batch-size
properties.description: The maximum number of messages to be fetched from the queue in a single request

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.sqs.enabled
properties.description: Enable the use of AWS SQS implementation to provide queues for consuming events.

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.sqs.endpoint
properties.description: The endpoint to use to connect to a local SQS server for testing

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.sqs.listener-queue-prefix
properties.description: The prefix to be used for the default listener queues

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.sqs.visibility-timeout
properties.description: The visibility timeout (in seconds) for the message on the queue

values.description: Use AWS SQS as the event queue to listen on for the WAIT task.
